author: xuhaihong
msg: GERONIMO-6133 The name of NamedXAResourceFactory is not configured while working with DataSource

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-5236: Client driver silently truncates strings that exceed 32KB
Prepare the network client for the possibility that a column is split
over more than two blocks in the response. This cannot happen until a
fix that makes the server stop sending truncated strings, has been
